rorgmod:Abstract Rorg Power.NAME: ERROR POWER
DESCRIPTIONS: RorgMod went wrong! Please tell @prod#0339 at STS Discord.

rorgmod:Loose Screws.NAME: Loose Screws
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Orb Slots whenever you play an #yAttack for the next #b

rorgmod:Centralize.NAME: Centralize
DESCRIPTIONS: The next Orb you would Evoke is Evoked an additional #b

rorgmod:Storm.NAME: Storm
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you Evoke Lightning, Gain #b

rorgmod:Overheat.NAME: Overheat
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you Evoke Lightning this turn, apply #b

rorgmod:Go for the Eyes.NAME: Go For The Eyes
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would apply any debuff to an enemy, apply #b

rorgmod:Shadowmeld.NAME: Shadowmeld
DESCRIPTIONS: Channel 1 Dark at the start of your turn. Whenever you channel an Orb, trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs.

rorgmod:Volatility.NAME: Volatility
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you Evoke Plasma each turn, Draw #b

rorgmod:Black Ice.NAME: Black Ice
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you Evoke Frost, Channel #b

rorgmod:Defragment.NAME: Defragment
DESCRIPTIONS: more damage for each Lightning you have.

rorgmod:Auto-Shields.NAME: Auto-Shields
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you evokes Frost, Channel #b
